description: wooden medallion; low relief building on front with text above and below; text on back; medium brown patina
inscription:
Inscription

on front, above image, in relief: [MACHINERY HALL]; ON FRONT, BELOW IMAGE, IN RELIEF: [1396 FT. LONG . 492 FT. WIDE]; on back, in relief: [THE 400TH ANNIVERSARY OF THE DISCOVERS OF AMERICA / U.S. AMERICA / 1893 / COLUMBIAN EXPOSITION / MAY 1 TO OCT 30. / JACKSON PARK / CHICAGO]
title: World's Fair Souvenier Medallion
